channel.title: The Doors on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in The Doors on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Trippin' On A Hole In A Paper Heart
item.description: Today in Tedium: As we were putting the finishing touches on last Thursday’s Tedium, a terrible bit of news hit the internetâ€”the death of Scott Weiland, one of the most influential rock vocalists of the last quarter-century. Weiland’s death, for many, was not a surprise, and that fact was touched upon by his former band, Stone Temple Pilots. In 2013, Weiland was kicked out of the band he helped make famous, leading to a lengthy legal battle between the two sides.
